pullrequest.title: Word-wrapping in treeviews and item views, adapted from David Meyer's implementation.

content.raw:
I figured most of it was behavior I hadn’t really noticed before. The subtler highlight should bring things back to what I’m subconsciously used to.

As for the closing tab thing, I can confirm tomorrow but my recollection is that you edit a unit value, hit enter, then the space bar. By the looks of things, it was triggering a press of the ‘X’ button on the group tab.
content.html:
I figured most of it was behavior I hadn’t really noticed before. The subtler highlight should bring things back to what I’m subconsciously used to.

As for the closing tab thing, I can confirm tomorrow but my recollection is that you edit a unit value, hit enter, then the space bar. By the looks of things, it was triggering a press of the ‘X’ button on the group tab.
